org.openmap4u.format

Interface Outputable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Gif, Jpg, Png, Svg

    public interface Outputable
extends Plugable
    This interface has to be implemented for every output format.
    Author:
    Michael Hadrbolec

    • Method Summary

      • setUp

        void setUp(java.awt.Shape shape,
           Length worldUnits,
           Length drawingUnits,
           Length strokeUnits,
           Angle angleUnits,
           java.awt.geom.AffineTransform globalTransform)
        Is only called once, before anything is drawn. It acts as initial setup.
        Parameters:
        shape - The canvas shape in drawing units.
        worldUnits - The world units.
        drawingUnits - The drawing units.
        strokeUnits - The stroke units.
        angleUnits - The angle units.
        globalTransform - The global transformation.

      • getGlobalTransform

        java.awt.geom.AffineTransform getGlobalTransform()
        Gets the global transformation from world units into ouputformat units.
        Returns:
        The global transformation from world units into ouputformat units.

      • before

        void before()
        Is called before a primitive (eg. a shape, or a text or an image) is drawn.

      • after

        void after()
        Is called after drawing a primitive (eg. a shape, or a text or an image) is drawn.

      • tearDown

        void tearDown()
        Is called only once after everything is drawn, and the result is written into the given output stream. It is used for cleanup.

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the map into the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream into which the map will be drawn.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Is thrown in the case an error occurs.
